page.title: 02Data Collecting
page.content: When we got our{D block}we divided it into 12 squares with a,b,c and d along the bottom and 1,2 and 3 up the side.The first time we went out we went up to Shobrook Park to interview Dr. Shelley.Then when we get back we write down what we found out and then we copy it out onto the Domesday disk.We do that with all our interviews and trips .Usually we go out in groups but when we visited the two busiest squares, A1 and A2 we went as a class.Sometimes when we go out we take some pictures of the area.We went out a few weeks ago to stand on the corner of our{D block.} Also when we get infomation we have to enter count data and for that you have to answer questions about our{D block. In the end all the infomation will be put on to video disk .
